titleInfo.title: Home recording on an 8 year-old Roy Acuff Jr.

mods.abstract: Home recording of an 8 year-old Roy Neill Acuff Jr., who performs two a cappella songs and talks with his father, Roy Acuff.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
